head.title: Car Seizure Is Proposed When Teenagers Drink

hedline.hl1: Car Seizure Is Proposed When Teenagers Drink

block.p: With the advice and help of high school students, a Nassau County legislator proposed a law yesterday that would enable the police to seize the cars of young people who drink and then try to drive.
With the advice and help of high school students, a Nassau County legislator proposed a law yesterday that would enable the police to seize the cars of young people who drink and then try to drive.

The bill, submitted by the legislator, John J. Ciotti, of North Valley Stream, would authorize the Nassau County police to take the vehicle from a youth who has been drinking, regardless of the amount of alcohol consumed, bring it to a local police station, and hold it for 24 hours.
